means: 造船业主，造船工程师，造船公司

sentence.Network_en: This is the mission of Chinese shipbuilder and we shall all be duty bound no regret.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就是中国造船人使命所在,对此我们责无旁贷、无怨无悔.

sentence.Network_en: They proposed to give the shipbuilder his head in the construction of these ships.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们提议在造这些船中让这位造船技师作主.

sentence.Network_en: Hyundai, the world's biggest shipbuilder, opened the $ 830 m plant last year to cope with increasing orders.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了应对越来越多的订单, 全球最大的造船公司现代重工去年投产了这座8.3亿美元的船厂.

entry.tran: 造船工人;造船公司;造船厂
entry.def: A shipbuilder is a company or a person that builds ships.

means.word_mean: 1. a carpenter who helps build and launch wooden vessels
2. a person who builds ships as a business
3. a business that builds and repairs ships
造船业主;造船工程师;造船公司
